description.en:
Bata (BTA), or Barter And Trade Alternative, describes itself as a cryptocurrency that has been developed to replace trade dollars in traditional barter systems. Bata aims to change way the way people trade by introducing Barter on the Blockchain. The project's vision is to introduce a new system of commerce (called Barterchain) that aims to create new jobs and help break away from the current system of debt based money.

The team claims that BATA has the following features:

- Dynamic Blocks - Based on block height and difficulty (means no cheap blocks)

- Instamine protection - Instamine protection will trigger after 5 blocks of a single algorithm are mined in a short period of time.

- Deadlock protection - Difficulty is reduced even when no new blocks are found, new blocks are mined much faster even after a period of very high hash rate.

- Spork control over block processing - The team claims to have full control of block processing without the need for wallet upgrades.

status_updates.description:
On another note..

My personal holding of Bata, a small amount have not been recovered / returned from Cryptopia, as I gather most have not.

https://www.coindesk.com/cryptopia-exchange-currently-in-liquidation-gets-hacked-again-report


https://bitcointalk.org/ is suppressing the Bata Announcement Thread and it is not appearing in the section when a post is made.

I have not given up yet.

I created another account today, within 5 mins Twitter locked me out. The only interactions I had on Twitter before the lock out was with the following accounts:

1. @EntangleIT (Satoshi Fraud / BSV nutjob) - This account blocked @CryptoOz & other my accounts.
2. @VVission (Bible basher / nutcase / Fraud / Bot like) This account blocked @CryptoOz & other my accounts.
3. @TeamSatoshi (Deniers)

Hack / Suppression update.

Please note, Bata's main Twitter account was suspended without explanation about a year ago.

My accounts on Twitter are still being suppressed. Currently the same events of over a year ago are occurring. I cannot login into personal my backup account @SwifToshi & main account @CryptoOz as they both ask for mobile phone verification but Twitter says the phone number is in use.

Hello all.

Github updated:

You can view, comment on, or merge this pull request online at:
  https://github.com/BTA-BATA/Bataoshi/pull/11

Commit Summary
Update README.md
File Changes
M README.md (2)
Patch Links:
https://github.com/BTA-BATA/Bataoshi/pull/11.patch
https://github.com/BTA-BATA/Bataoshi/pull/11.diff

A crypto exchange should be easy to understand, easy to use and available for the masses. 
 - Dachcoin Exchange

Bata has been added to the voting list. 

thanks Dachcoin

https://voting.dachcoin.live/

https://discord.gg/fHUrfTz

Beware of imitations
#BTA has been in use since May 08 2015. This token : 0xd2bd6415db70a0f0b26c973b15b63bac74f5c9c6 Token (link: http://disq.us/t/39854cb) disq.us/t/39854cb has not been issued by BATA #CRYPTOCURRENCY, nor is it connected in anyway. It appears the issuer did not have the diligence to research the symbol.
